alert.note: Alert for Jenkins; Screven (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 30 at 6:53PM EDT until further notice by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of southeast Georgia, including the following counties, Jenkins and Screven. Portions of southeast South Carolina, including the following county, Allendale. * WHEN...Until 830 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. Overflowing poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 652 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain associated with Tropical Storm Idalia moving through the area. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Allendale, Millen, Butts, Hiltonia, Sycamore, Ulmer, Millhaven, Hilltonia, Burtons Ferry Landing, Millett, Martin, Appleton, Perkins, Seigling, Emmalane, Herndon, Bascom, Averill, Milbury and Baldock.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
